title: Expand ROTMHS glossary to 3000+ generic Murim terms
description: Current ROTMHS glossary has 300+ terms. Expand to 3000+ by adding generic Korean Murim vocabulary.
design: Research: KR Murim novels, wuxia glossaries. Cross-reference to avoid duplicates.
acceptance_criteria: 3000+ unique terms, Korean-Hanja-Hán Việt mapping, Frequency ranking, No duplicates

title: Test with 5 different KR Murim novels
description: Cross-novel testing: ROTMHS, Legend of Northern Blade, Nano Machine, Heavenly Demon, Swordmaster.
design: Test coverage: pure Murim (historical), modern Murim, edge cases. Collect failures for refinement.
acceptance_criteria: 5 novels tested, Edge case collection, Failure analysis, Cross-novel consistency check

title: Create Ref_KR_HONORIFIC_SYSTEM.md (30KB)
description: Document Korean sect hierarchy honorific system with speech patterns.
design: Sections: Sect Hierarchy, External Terms, Speech Levels, Context Rules. Include flowchart.
acceptance_criteria: 30KB file, 5+ hierarchy generations, 50+ terms, Decision tree, 10+ examples

title: Create Ref_CULTIVATION_STAGES.md (25KB)
description: Map Korean cultivation realms with language intensity scaling.
design: Sections: Realm Hierarchy, Naming Patterns, Language Intensity, Breakthrough Terms.
acceptance_criteria: 25KB file, 10+ realms, Sect variations, Language examples, 20+ terms

title: Epic: Week 2 - XML Architecture
description: Design and implement KR_MURIM_TRANSLATOR.xml with 7 core sections. Build FACTION_ALIGNMENT system to replace RTAS. Implement Korean honorific logic for sect hierarchy.

title: Design COMBAT_LEXICON with 200+ vivid martial arts verbs
description: Build combat-focused lexicon: neutral→vivid verb replacements for KR action scenes.
design: Section: COMBAT_LEXICON. 3 intensity levels: neutral (vung kiếm), vivid (chém giáng), extreme (triệt hạ). Categorize by technique type (검법, 장법, 권법).
acceptance_criteria: 200+ verbs documented, 3 intensity levels, Categorized by technique, Usage examples

title: Create Library_MURIM_GOLDEN_SAMPLES.md (50KB)
description: Compile 15-20 S-tier KR-VN translation examples into library module.
design: File: Reference/Library_MURIM_GOLDEN_SAMPLES.md. Structure: source, translation, analysis, techniques used.
acceptance_criteria: 50KB file, 15-20 samples, Side-by-side format, Analysis annotations, Technique tagging

title: Create IO_PROTOCOL with Hanja display toggle
description: Build dual-output system: Chatbox metadata + Canvas clean text. Add Hanja display toggle.
design: Section: IO_PROTOCOL. Reuse JP-LN structure. Add toggle: clean vs bilingual (Mai Hoa Kiếm Pháp vs Mai Hoa Kiếm Pháp 梅花劍法).
acceptance_criteria: Dual-output working, Hanja toggle option, Metadata format defined, Canvas output clean

title: Epic: Week 4 - Reference Modules
description: Create detailed reference documentation for Korean honorifics, cultivation stages, combat choreography, and Hanja romanization rules.

title: Epic: Week 3 - Combat Module
description: Build combat-focused translation module with 200+ vivid martial arts verbs. Implement qi description templates and extended choreography patterns for KR action scenes.

title: Design KR_MURIM_TRANSLATOR.xml structure (7 sections)
description: Create base XML with 7 sections: MURIM_LOC, COMBAT, FMT, GUARD, HANJA_PROTOCOL, IO_PROTOCOL, COMBAT_LEXICON.
design: File: KR_MURIM_TRANSLATOR.xml. Target: 1000 lines, 50KB. Reuse JP-LN formatting. Adapt GUARD section.
acceptance_criteria: 1000+ lines XML, 7 sections defined, 50KB file size, Valid XML syntax

title: Implement ACTION_PACING logic for staccato style
description: Build sentence shattering module for rapid-fire KR action pacing.
design: Section: COMBAT. Sentence splitting rules. Fragment optimization. Punctuation patterns (。→。). Vs JP emotional beats.
acceptance_criteria: Sentence shattering rules, Fragment patterns, Pacing comparison JP vs KR, 5+ test passages

title: Create Ref_HANJA_ROMANIZATION_KR.md (15KB)
description: Document Revised Romanization 2000 rules for Korean names.
design: File: Reference/Ref_HANJA_ROMANIZATION_KR.md. Rules: consonant clusters, vowel combinations, name consistency examples.
acceptance_criteria: 15KB file, RR2000 rules documented, Name consistency guide, 100+ examples

title: Collect edge cases and refine anti-translationese
description: Analyze test failures, refine GUARD section for KR-VN patterns.
design: Categories: combat terms, honorifics, cultivation. Update GUARD section. Create edge case test suite.
acceptance_criteria: 50+ edge cases documented, GUARD section refined, Test suite created, Pattern improvements

title: Implement FACTION_ALIGNMENT system (-5.0 to +5.0)
description: Replace RTAS system with Jeongpa-Sapa alignment scoring for pronoun selection.
design: Section: MURIM_LOC. Scoring: +5.0 righteous, 0.0 neutral, -5.0 demonic. Keyword triggers. Pronoun mapping.
acceptance_criteria: Alignment scoring logic, Keyword detection (정파, 사파, 마교), Pronoun selection rules, 10+ test cases

title: Implement HANJA_PROTOCOL mapping logic
description: Create Hanja-to-Hán Việt lookup system using Library_HANJA_MURIM_TERMS.md.
design: Section: HANJA_PROTOCOL. Mapping triggers. Romanization vs translation rules. Consistency lock for names.
acceptance_criteria: Lookup integration with Library, Name consistency system, Translation vs romanization logic, Fallback handling

title: Create Ref_COMBAT_CHOREOGRAPHY.md (20KB)
description: Document extended fight scene patterns and energy integration.
design: File: Reference/Ref_COMBAT_CHOREOGRAPHY.md. Sections: Pattern types, Energy flow, Multi-move combos, Pacing rules, Examples.
acceptance_criteria: 20KB file, 15+ patterns documented, Energy integration guide, Example fight scenes, Pacing guidelines

title: Implement Korean honorific logic for sect hierarchy
description: Build honorific substitution system using Ref_KR_HONORIFIC_SYSTEM.md.
design: Section: MURIM_LOC. Integrated terms (사형→sư huynh). Context-aware selection. Speech level mapping.
acceptance_criteria: Honorific substitution rules, Context detection logic, 50+ term mappings, Integration with Ref module

title: Epic: Week 5 - Quality Validation
description: Translate 15-20 benchmark passages from Return of Mount Hua Sect. Create golden samples library and validate quality vs professional translations.

title: Epic: Week 1 - Lexicon Foundation
description: Extract and structure 3000+ Korean Murim Hanja terms. Build foundational terminology database with Hán Việt mappings. Create core reference modules for honorifics and cultivation stages.

title: Epic: Week 6 - Testing & Refinement
description: Test system with 5 different Korean Murim novels. Collect edge cases, refine anti-translationese rules for KR-VN translation patterns.

title: Validate translation quality vs professional
description: Compare system output with professional ROTMHS translations.
design: Metrics: terminology consistency, pacing accuracy, naturalness. Use Ref_QUALITY_METRICS if available.
acceptance_criteria: Quality comparison report, 95%+ terminology match, Pacing analysis, Improvement recommendations

title: Adapt GUARD section from JP-LN anti-translationese
description: Reuse 80% from JP-LN GUARD. Add KR-specific patterns: ban 'đánh nhau', use 'giao chiến'.
design: Section: GUARD. Copy JP-LN guardrails. Add KR combat terms. Adapt passive voice rules for KR-VN.
acceptance_criteria: 80% reuse from JP-LN, 20+ KR-specific patterns, Combat term preferences, Test samples

title: Create extended choreography patterns for KR fight scenes
description: Build technical combat sequence templates (3x longer than JP).
design: Section: COMBAT. Staccato sentence shattering. Multi-move sequences. Attack-block-counter patterns. Energy integration.
acceptance_criteria: 15+ choreography patterns, Sentence length optimization, Multi-move sequences, Energy flow integration

title: Implement qi description templates
description: Create templates for internal energy flow narration (내공, 검기, 검강).
design: Section: COMBAT. Template patterns: qi gathering, qi release, energy clash, meridian flow. Intensity scaling by cultivation realm.
acceptance_criteria: 10+ qi templates, Realm-based intensity, Energy type variations, Example passages

title: Translate 15-20 ROTMHS benchmark passages
description: Translate sample passages from Return of Mount Hua Sect for quality validation.
design: Select: combat scenes, dialogue, cultivation descriptions. Use completed KR_MURIM_TRANSLATOR.xml. Track: accuracy, pacing, terminology.
acceptance_criteria: 15-20 passages translated, Variety coverage (combat/dialogue/cultivation), Quality notes, Professional comparison ready

title: Structure Library_HANJA_MURIM_TERMS.md (500KB)
description: Build 500KB Hanja terminology database with frequency indexing.
design: File: Reference/Library_HANJA_MURIM_TERMS.md. 8 categories + frequency index.
acceptance_criteria: 500KB file, 3000+ terms, 8 categories, Frequency index top 500

title: Create Library_ROTMHS_GLOSSARY.md (150KB)
description: Transform ROTMHS-glossary-extraction into 150KB library module.
design: Convert extraction report: metadata, examples, character names, technique families.
acceptance_criteria: 150KB file, 300+ terms, Character mapping, Technique families, Examples
